wikipedia_page.main: Gerard A. Lightowler (5 September 1940 – 26 July 2008) was an English professional footballer, who played more than 200 games for his hometown club Bradford Park Avenue. He also played for Bradford City, Guiseley, and in the US with Los Angeles Wolves.

response: *26 July 2008 – Gerry Lightowler, 67, former Bradford Park Avenue and Bradford City full back.
